value.desc:
Theme Homepage
Documentation
Support
Demo Import Video Preview

evolve Plus key features

  • 20 Pre-built Demos

    Build a Website Within a Minute With The Modern Minimalist Demos

  • One Page Parallax Layout

    Simple But Very Effective One Page Parallax Feature

  • 12 Premium Widgets

    Add Many Effective Custom Widgets To Display Your Facebook Page, Twitter And Much More

  • Theme4Press Slider

    Image or Video Responsive Unlimited Slides With Nice Animations

  • Built-in Mega Menu

    Excellent Mega Menu When You Need To Add Widgets Or Specially Style Your Menu

  • Shortcodes

    Create Alerts, Tabs, Pricing Tables etc.

  • Custom Fonts

    Upload Your Own Custom Font With An Easiness

  • 900+ Google Fonts

    A Great Collection Of Unique Google Font Families

  • 10 Predefined Color Schemes

    Pick a New Color Scheme For Your Website With Just a Click

  • 12 Main Menu Hover Effects

    Select From Many Main Menu Effects And Styles

  • 23 Sub Menu Hover Effects

    Unique Animations Of The Submenu Items

  • 4 Search Field Styles

    Choose the right search field style and effect for your website

  • Custom Sidebars

    Create Unique Sidebars With Widgets For Any Page

  • Portfolios

    Up To 9 Layouts – Select The Right Type For Your Showcase

  • Google Map Contact

    Contact Page Template With The Google Map And reCaptcha Protection

  • Sticky Navigation

    Sticky Navigation Is Perfect If You Need Organized Pages - For Example For Documentation

  • Lightbox

    Responsive Lightbox Ready To Display Your Amazing Shots, YouTube Or Vimeo Videos, Or Instagram Photos

  • Slider Revolution (Bundled)

    Responsive Premium WordPress Slider With Breathtaking Effects

  • LayerSlider (Bundled)

    Create Fantastic Slides With The Bundled Premium Slider Plugin

  • 100% Width Template

    100% Width Template Let You To Set Any Page To Be Full Width Of The Browser's Window

  • Post/Page Custom Layouts

    Select Unique Post/Page Layout Like Sidebar Position, Breadcrumbs, Post/Page Titles etc.

  • Custom Headers

    Custom Headers Can Be Set Per Post/Page

  • Header Layouts

    5 Header Layouts

  • Live Customizer

    300+ Theme Options

  • WooCommerce

    Custom/Global Sidebar For WooCommerce Pages

  • Bootstrap Slider

    EXTRA IN PREMIUM: Unlimited Number Of Slides, Slides Reorder

  • Parallax Slider

    EXTRA IN PREMIUM: Unlimited Number Of Slides, Slides Reorder

  • Posts Slider

    EXTRA IN PREMIUM: Up To 30 Slides
Compare With Premium Version

value.title: Custom Footer
value.subtitle:
Available HTML tags and attributes:

<b> <i> <a href="" title=""> <blockquote> <del datetime="">
<ins datetime=""> <img src="" alt="" /> <ul> <ol> <li>
<code> <em> <strong> <div> <span> <h1> <h2> <h3> <h4> <h5> <h6>
<table> <tbody> <tr> <td> <br /> <hr />

Default: <div id="copyright"><a href="https://theme4press.com/evolve-multipurpose-wordpress-theme/">evolve</a> theme by Theme4Press - Powered by <a href="http://wordpress.org">WordPress</a></div>
value.default: evolve theme by Theme4Press - Powered by WordPress
